meanings.meaning: draw yourself up/rise to your full height

vlive.korean: 진짜 꼿꼿이 펴진 느낌 - 그렇지? It feels all straight. - Right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TALK X TODAY : Season2 EP.4
그리고 얘는 꼿꼿이 졸아. And she sleeps like that too. 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV2 급식단의 대모험 EP.02
vlive.english: And she sleeps like that too.

vlive.korean: 맞아. -그렇게 허리를 꼿꼿이 하고. I know. - With her perfect posture. 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV2 급식단의 대모험 EP.02
vlive.english: I know. - With her perfect posture.

vlive.korean: 그럼 꼿꼿이 세우세요. 그러면 되잖아요. - 저요? Then you can sit upright too. - Me? 듣기 View video AKMU : [AKMU의 사춘기노트 p.01]
vlive.english: Then you can sit upright too. - Me?

vlive.korean: 맞아야 되니까 꼿꼿이 펴쟤. - 이거 진짜 어렵네. Square up so we can get hit. - This is so hard. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : ROMEO - 로미오 '본격 벌칙받기 방송'
vlive.english: Square up so we can get hit. - This is so hard.

examples.korean: She sat upright in bed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 침대 위에 꼿꼿이 앉아 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She sat upright in bed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a dog with ears and tail erect 듣기 Add to Wordbook 귀와 꼬리를 꼿꼿이 세운 개. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a dog with ears and tail erect Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Hold up one's head for the sergeant ! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상사님 앞에서 고개를 꼿꼿이 세워라! YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I'll just toss my head at them, like this!' 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그들 앞에서 꼿꼿이 머리를 들 거야. 이렇게!' Neungyule
examples.english: I'll just toss my head at them, like this!' Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I jumped and sat up straight, with my fingers tingling. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 손가락에 얼얼함을 느끼면서 다시 꼿꼿이 앉았다. Neungyule
examples.english: I jumped and sat up straight, with my fingers tingling. Add to Wordbook
